destination.notReachable: The selected system is not reachable. System name: {{systemName}}, error: {{- error}}

errors.cannotReadCapServiceMetadata: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. See log for more details.
errors.capModelAndServicesLoadError: An error occurred loading the CAP model and services. {{- error}}
errors.capServiceUrlPathNotDefined: An error occurred reading CAP service metadata: {{serviceName}}. CAP service property `urlPath` is not defined but is required.
errors.servicesUnavailable: An error occurred retrieving service(s) for SAP System.
errors.certificateError: A certificate error has occurred: {{- error}}
errors.urlCertValidationError: The system URL is using {{certErrorReason}} security certificate.
errors.authenticationTimeout: Authorization was not verified within the allowed time. Please ensure you have authenticated using the associated browser window.
errors.connectionError: A connection error occurred, please ensure the target host is available on the network: {{- error}}
errors.timeout: A connection timeout error occurred: {{- error}}
errors.serverReturnedAnError: The server returned an error. {{errorDesc}} {{- errorMsg}}
errors.serverUnableToCompleteRequest: The server was unable to complete the request
errors.odataServiceUrlNotFound: The service URL you have provided is not a valid OData Service. Fiori applications require an OData service as the data source.
errors.noServicesAvailable: There are no V{{version}} OData services available from the selected system and the template you have chosen supports V{{version}} OData services only
errors.redirectError: A redirect response was received from the server
errors.odataServiceVersionMismatch: The template you have chosen supports V{{requiredVersion}} OData services only. The provided version is V{{serviceVersion}}.
errors.systemOrServiceUrlNotFound: Please verify the url: {{- url}}, target system configuration and network connectivity
errors.certValidationRequired: Certificate validation is required to continue.
errors.serviceMetadataError: An error occurred reading service metadata for service: {{- servicePath}}
errors.noAbapEnvsInCFSpace: No ABAP environments in CF space found.
errors.abapEnvsCFDiscoveryFailed: Discovering ABAP Environments failed. Please ensure you are logged into Cloud Foundry (see https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/getting-started.html#login).
errors.abapServiceAuthenticationFailed: ABAP environment authentication using UAA failed.
errors.serviceCatalogRequest: An error occurred requesting services from: {{- catalogRequestUri }} and entity set: {{entitySet}}. {{error}}
errors.storedSystemConnectionError: An error occurred while validating the stored system connection info. System name: {{-systemName}}, error: {{- error}}
errors.noCatalogOrServiceAvailable: No active system or odata service endpoint connection available to retrieve service(s).
errors.systemConnectionValidationFailed: A connection to the selected system could not be established.
errors.allCatalogServiceRequestsFailed: All catalog service requests failed for the selected system. OData version(s): V{{version}}.
